summary: Diff implements a premium dark visual system across layout and pages, adds a shared PageHeader, redesigns Game page to the requested hero/wheel/CTA layout with quick actions, and improves perceived performance via React Query caching/refetch policy updates and replacing some full-page loading states with inline skeletons/spinner-on-initial-load only. One REQ-1 asset (wordmark) is not evidenced in the provided AppLayout snippet. Diff summary also references payment/Stripe-related UI not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure existing generated header/branding assets (e.g., /assets/generated/onyx-wordmark.dim_1024x256.png) continue to render correctly and fit the new global layout.
missing_requirements.reason: AppLayout snippet shows the background image (/assets/generated/onyx-background.dim_1920x1080.png) but the diff evidence does not show the onyx wordmark being rendered in the new header/layout, so compliance cannot be confirmed from provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin-only Stripe configuration UI (PaymentSetup) to set secret key/allowed countries.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly focuses on UI restyling and performance; adding/configuring Stripe is not requested and may introduce new flows beyond visual updates.
BuildRequest non-goals include not adding new routes; a dedicated failure page/route is not requested (unclear if it pre-existed, but the diff summary calls it out as part of the change set).

hallucinated_features.description: Changed navigation route for payment success to '/payment-success' instead of '/payments/success'.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the stated requirements (UI reference match + performance). This is a behavioral/routing change and could affect existing route structure (non-goal warns against adding new routes).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions BuyCreditsPage "fixed navigation to use correct route '/payment-success' instead of '/payments/success'.")
